re as a statement of fact, and then ride the asses of anyone that questions=

ember here for a long time. Keep my mouth shut, but this is more than cross=

 look at it, lets look at what we know to be the truth and lets take all of=
 that data into consideration and discernment before coming to a conclusion=
.
=C2=A0
That is not to much to ask!

tail of the lion, but I have no doubt that the lion belongs to it even thou=

ptics and debunkers tout as the answer to all paranormal experience. I thin=

tten "voices" that I thought were perfectly clear, and no one else could he=
ar it, and some=C2=A0I found=C2=A0was just=C2=A0a snippet of music, so yeah=

xes, and other EVP methods, you=C2=A0 just have to be aware of the possibil=

=C2=A0

d up in a carpet right in front of me, not something I just happened across=

=C2=A0
=C2=A0When I first switche=

ation either, I think the mind(which is not brain) has to reprogram the ear=
s, which are brain, to hear.=C2=A0 I also think the skeptics can not allow =
this programming to take place, hence they can't hear. I would be very surp=
rised if any of the hard core skeptics even turned on a box for fear that t=
hey may hear something that's not there. Rorke(the Phd) implied as much whe=
n he wanted a box to test, or more=C2=A0like debunk. That crap is frikkin' =
pathetic!
=C2=A0

F-S

areidolia.
